item.tib: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: a rya bad tra kal bi ka/ na ma ma hA yA na su trA
item.coloph: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bhyid dya ka ra sing ha dang/ lo tsa ba ban de dpal gyi dbyangs kyis bsgyurd/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: End of Mss: OM he dar ma he du pra ba/ he dun te shan ta thA ga to ha ba dad te shan tsa yo ni ro da e bAm ba ti ma ha sra ma na yA sva hA

item.tib: 'phags pa byams pa lung bstand pa
item.skttrans: a rya me'e tre ya bya ka ra na ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa byams pa lung bstand pa/ rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: 'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'
item.skttrans: a rya su khA pa ti byu ha na ma ma ha yA na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo'/ rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba
item.skttrans: A rya badzra dhA dza pa ri nA ma na
item.coloph: 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba/ brdzogs s+ho

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: a rya sab ta/ ta tha ga ta pU rba pra ti dha na bi she sha bi sta ra na ma ma ha ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo brgyad brgya pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa

item.tib: 'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo'
item.skttrans: A rya dhar ma ne tri nA ma ma ha ya na/ su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'// rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gi mkhan po prad nya bar ma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas bsgyurd cing zhus te rtan la phab pa

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi khams su 'thun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'
item.skttrans: A rya lo ka nu pa rta nA nA ma ma ha ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'thun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'/ rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa

item.tib: 'phags pa rgya cher rold pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: a rya la li ta bi sta ra na ma ma ha ya na su tra
